Player History
Released by Boston on 3/2/1965...
Drafted in 1st round, 3rd overall pick, by Chicago (A) in 1968...
Had first career hit (triple) on 4/26/1978, off Tom A. Murphy (DET)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/26/1978, off Tom A. Murphy (DET)...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/21/1982, hitting .500 with 1 HR, 2 RBI...
Drafted in 1st round, 4th overall pick, by Chicago (A) in 1985...
Earned first career win on 4/2/1987...
Injured on 9/29/1988 with a Tender Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/3/1989 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for full season...
Was selected to the 1994 Allstar game...
Struck out 15 batters against Oakland on 9/1/1994...
Struck out 17 batters against Detroit on 6/8/1995...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/1997, going 5-1, 1.24...
Was selected to the 1997 Allstar game...
Injured on 10/10/1997 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
